column1: Little Goat Diner////My co-workers and I had sandwiches & coffee at the grab-n-go counter. We were impressed with everything. The turkey
column3: and veg sandwiches were all off the charts delicious! Kelsey
column5: took our order and pointed out that Stephanie
column6: the owner would be making our sandwiches today. He also invited us to check out their new roof-top patio! We are definitely coming back to do a happy hour up there. What a view!
